entry.title: Talking about economic learning
entry.content:
Talking about economic learning
Recently, when writing economic assignments, there are often unexpected errors, which are caused by inattention. For example, when writing export becomes more expensive and import becomes cheaper. Export decreases and import increases. Output falls, and the unemployment rise. The output should be reduced. I wrote that the output is increased, which caused the analysis of the subsequent employment to be wrong. The analysis is logical. If one mistake appears, you will make mistakes step by step. This will lead to serious consequences. If you are on an exam, you will not get enough points on this question. If it is in real life, then the consequences of this error will be beyond our estimation. Thus, we must be rigorous, be careful when analyzing, thinking questions, or writing down.
In addition, I wrote essay before, thinking that I would write poorly, because we have not learned much about perfect competitive market, and certainly I cannot write much about it. I would worry that I can only write a few sentences. Well, all I can do is write down every point I know. When writing that essay, I often write and delete, and then add some more. I try to explain each point more clearly. Strive to fill each logic chain so that they can be more closely connected, it turns out that this works well. We have to dare to try, write, and explain it little by little. If the explanation written in the first pass is not clear, read it a few more times and change it a few times, and always succeed in the end.

entry.title: How to write essay？
entry.content:
How to write essay？
Dr Andrew Hunt helped me improve the essay writing. I have the following thoughts: First, be careful when reviewing questions! Don’t miss any keywords. When writing, the keywords should be mentioned and explained. Second, we must pay more attention to the citation norms, such as the author’s last name, year of publication, and so on. Also, each page should include at least your name (or student number), date of submission, Module or department. After writing, check again.
The following pictures are my comments and articles by Dr Andrew Hunt.








Finally, attach some notes on how to write essay.

entry.title: numpy
entry.content:
NumPy can help us store and manipulate data more efficiently. It can create arrays, get single elements from arrays, stitch and split arrays and much more. But with its so many functions, it brings a big problem, which is to remember every command statement, its format and its meaning. The teacher’s advice to us is: You can form muscle memory through a lot of practice, and it will be much simpler.

When I first came into contact with NumPy, it was actually a bit unsuitable to me, because NumPy and Python actually have some difference. For example, in NumPy, you need to type “import NumPy as np” in the first sentence, otherwise the code will not run.

Another important point is that unlike Python, NumPy arrays are of a fixed type. If you add a floating type directly to an integer array as in the following figure, the floating type will be automatically truncated to an integer type. And it will not give you tips or warnings.
![8tuELD.png](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/03/17/8tuELD.png

Why writes code? Because there is too much data. Indeed, NumPy can help us process data and visualize it.

For example, here is a histogram of the number of rainy days by using matplotlib. The histogram shows the meaning of the data and makes it easier to analyze the general situation of precipitation.

There is an array of two-dimensional normally distributed points. These points are visualized with a scatter plot (picture1). 20 points are randomly selected, and the selected points are marked with a large circle on the picture (picture2). This method is often used to quickly segment data, test data to verify statistical models, and use it in sampling methods when answering statistical questions.

entry.title: python1
entry.content:
In January 2020, the beginning of the winter vacation also meant that my python learning journey began.

After a period of learning, I found that python is really very useful and practical. It can help us do a lot of things. It can be closely related to our study and life.

For example, it can help us judge our grade, which is a code that automatically judges the grade based on our score.

If you enter your score: 85 (your input is 85), then it will tell you your grade is A(the output is A).

Let us look at another code. This code is also very interesting because it is a bit like the code lock in our real life.

First of all, you need to answer who you are. When you confirm your identity (your input is Joe), you can enter the next question (it will say ‘Hello, Joe. What is the password? (It is a fish.)’, then you can enter the password (input your answer). If you enter the correct password (swordfish), it will display ‘Access granted.’ However, if you make a mistake three times (three times of input are not ‘swordfish’), it will break and display ‘Please try again.’

In addition, python gives me the biggest feeling is that we must be careful, pay attention to Chinese and English characters, spaces, alignment, etc. Any inconspicuous mistake will cause the entire programming to fail, so we must always practice more and type the code more hands Try a lot. Having a try and then correct the errors is an important part of python learning.

entry.title: Extracurricular activities of 2019-2020 Academic Year, Semester I
entry.content:
This summer, I participated in the thirteenth Future International Business Challenge. This is the first time that I played with more than 500 people in the same hall. I felt very excited. There were many unexpected situations in the competition. Fortunately, they are all solved one by one. Flexibility and adaptability are very important. We are traders in this competition, but to be a good trader, we must not only know what the trader should do, but also how the producer should do it. Negotiate better with manufacturers, how to reduce our costs, and need to understand what consumers really want and what they want. I think this is a very important point in business activities.
At the end of August, I studied Ride-share matching algorithms generate income inequality (Eszter Bokányi, 2019) and made a report in front of a dozen people. This is the first time that I have studied a research report completely independently, although I feel I am prepared I have enough, and I have simulated it at home, but I still feel nervous when I really report, and I speak a little fast. I hope that when I do the presentation again, I can be more logical and organized! This report covers many fields that we have never been in contact with. This article may involve many fields such as business, economic, statistics, algorithms, computers, etc. We should also develop diversified and contact as many different fields as possible. When thinking about an event or a phenomenon, we must also look at it from multiple angles and in multiple fields.
Weekly reading discussion began at the end of September. We have set up a group on the general direction of economics and business, and will have a discussion on the books we read that week. Everyone reads different books or materials. We may have five gains a week, and we will it is a very interesting thing. Different books, different authors, their thinking styles, etc. are different, and there are different opinions on the same thing. The discussion on this viewpoint is also very thought-provoking. of. In addition, when showing what I read, everyone used different methods. Some people are used to writing blackboard books, some people are used to mind maps, and others are like teachers. They guide students step by step to find the answer to this question. But I think visualization is a very important thing, we must let everyone know concisely and clearly.
I had a UKMT Senior Mathematics Challenge in November and got a silver award. Last year, I got a gold award. This made me wonder if my mathematics was going backwards, and whether I spend less energy on math. I hope I can do better planning and allocating my time and accumulate more on mathematics.
Starting to build your own Github with programming on December 5, and it has now been completed. Github is completely built with programming. I have only touched programming before, but this time it is the first time to use programming to do something. The process is very tortuous, and I also became a “code farmer”. I need to check carefully. A punctuation mark or a space will cause a fatal error. Be patient and never give up. At one step, I did it 12 times repeatedly, deleted the folder 11 times, took 3 hours, and finally succeeded.
Participated in the ETS HEIghten® Critical Thinking Challenge on December 7, and had a clearer concept of critical thinking. I wrote a segment of about 400 words with the knowledge of critical thinking learned in the competition.
Participated in the NEC (National Economics Challenge) preliminary round and successfully advanced to the rematch on December 21. For this competition, I taught myself a lot of AP economics, and also understood some of our current knowledge from a wider perspective. NEC is a team competition. In the process of preparing for the competition, we encourage each other and help each other answer research questions.
In addition, this semester, I also served as the president of Business Simulation Club, and also the volunteer leader of the Ming Xiaoling Museum. As a leader, what is more important is how to mobilize the enthusiasm of team members, how to increase the cohesion of a team, how to better take care of each member, meet the needs of members as much as possible, share their experience with them, they may be allowed to take fewer detours, or to make detours ahead of time, and make fewer mistakes in actual competitions or volunteering. Especially for volunteer work, we should actively provide tourists with the right help and think what people want to help them. Our team was awarded an outstanding volunteer team, and I personally was awarded an excellent volunteer.

entry.title: Summary of 2019-2020 Academic Year, Semester I
entry.content:
Meditation, urgency, sense of purpose
This semester, compared with before, I feel that I am more meditation. I can do something more dedication, and slowly settle down, I insist on reading some books related to economics, finance and mathematics this semester. Weekly reading discussions also brought me a lot of gains. I have a clearer goal for the future as well. No matter in the professional direction or something else, I am more efficient and motivated to do things with goals. Just because I have a relatively clear goal, I know how many things I have not done in the remaining year and a half of my high school, and how much I need to work hard. I feel that time is very urgent and there are many things I want to do. However, because of time, I may have to make a choice. This is also a point I regret. Next, it will soon be a mock exam, and then it will be a CIE exam. I need to work harder. I need to do more past papers and solve as many problems as I can and check for gaps that I still do not understand. I hope I can get a satisfactory result in the exam.

entry.title: Markdown语法介绍
entry.content:
在前面的课程中，我们已经成功搭建了我们的blog，并将它放到了github通过域名进行访问，今天我们来学习一下如何用Markdown来写文章。

首先简要介绍一下什么是Markdown：

  • Markdown 是一种轻量级标记语言，它允许人们使用易读易写的纯文本格式编写文档。

  • Markdown 语言在 2004 由约翰·格鲁伯（英语：John Gruber）创建。

  • Markdown 编写的文档可以导出 HTML 、Word、图像、PDF、Epub 等多种格式的文档。

  • Markdown 编写的文档后缀为 .md, .markdown。

1.Markdown标题

我们使用#号来标记我们的标题,一共有六级标题,分别对应1到6个#号,如下

对应显示效果如下

2、Markdown段落

（1）字体

Markdown支持显示以下几种字体

对应显示效果如下：

（2）分隔线

我们使用三个以上减号来建立分隔线

显示效果如下

（3）删除线

删除线只需要在文字两端加上双波浪线即可~~

显示效果如下
HELLO

（4）下划线

显示效果如下

下划线

3、Markdown列表

列表分为有序列表和无序列表

1、无序列表如下所示（注意后面加一个空格）

显示效果如下

  • 第一项
  • 第二项
  • 第三项

2、有序列表如下所示（注意后面加一个空格）

显示效果如下

  1. 第一项
  2. 第二项
  3. 第三项

3、列表嵌套用法

显示效果如下

  1. 第一项：
    • 第一项嵌套的第一个元素
    • 第一项嵌套的第二个元素
  2. 第二项：
    • 第二项嵌套的第一个元素
    • 第二项嵌套的第二个元素

4、Markdown引用

显示效果如下

引用的一段话，这里演示用。

5、Markdown代码

（1）、代码

显示效果如下
printf()

（2）、代码段

输入如下：

显示效果如下：

6、Markdown链接

如下所示输入超链接

显示效果如下（可点击跳转百度）
百度

7、Markdown表格

实例如下：

显示效果如下：

左对齐 右对齐 居中对齐
单元格 单元格 单元格
单元格 单元格 单元格

8、Markdown图片

插入图片我们需要先上传到图床网站获取链接，然后再插入图片链接，具体操作如下：

  1. 我们首先打开网站https://imgchr.com/

  2. 点击开始上传，上传一张我们想要的图

  3. 上传好了我们找到下面Markdown Code并复制

  4. 将复制的链接粘贴过来

显示成功如下

这是一些基本的用法,学会了这些我们就可以写一些基本的文章来记录自己的日常啦~
